trees.panel

Class PanelOffset<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Dimension2D
      • java.awt.Dimension
        • trees.panel.PanelOffset<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class PanelOffset<T>
extends java.awt.Dimension
    Helper class for calculating and storing the offset of the displayed tree. The offset is calculated with respect to the panel's current orientation and alignment.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

    Serialized Form
